title: Calories in Popeyes Chicken Wrap
meta_description: Learn calories in Popeyes chicken wrap, including full nutrition facts like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Based on Popeyes' spicy crispy chicken wrap with one fried tender, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and flour tortilla; no extra sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact menu item, portion size, and customizations. Check Popeyes app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Popeyes chicken wrap contains about 650 kcal and 30 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

tweaks.label: Use grilled chicken tender instead of fried
Extra lettuce and tomato (no calorie change, but adds volume)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Popeyes chicken wrap?
faqs.a: Approximately 650 kcal for one standard spicy chicken wrap.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Popeyes chicken wrap?
faqs.a: About 30 g protein per wrap from the chicken tender.

faqs.q: Are Popeyes chicken wraps high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1520 mg sodium per wrap due to seasoning and breading.
Roughly 52 g carbs, mostly from the tortilla and any veggies.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Popeyes chicken wrap?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled chicken and skip sauce to reduce by ~200 kcal.
